input_text:
Job Title: Associate Underwriter

Location: Greater Philadelphia

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, General Business

Description:
Instant Quote Associate Underwriter
USLI is seeking candidates to join our innovative, fun and collaborative Instant Quote team. This could be your opportunity to transition from a sales or customer service role into underwriting with an A++ rated insurance carrier!
In addition to a competitive salary, we offer quarterly bonuses (after a year of employment) and a generous profit-sharing plan that can combine to add 15% to 20% or more to your total compensation.*We offer a comprehensive benefits package including 100% of monthly medical premiums paid by USLI. Keep more of your paycheck with no payroll deduction for health insurance and no high-deductible plans!*Each of our modern and inviting office locations provide free lunch and access to an on-site gym!*
*See for yourself at www.usli.com/careers/
We are looking for self-motivated individuals who can make sound decisions, communicate clearly and provide excellent service to customers while offering insurance quotes over the phone. This position requires a positive and friendly attitude, a high service mindset, strong verbal communication skills, and problem solving capabilities. The ability to effectively work in a fast-paced team environment is required. If you have the right attitude and you work hard, we will teach you the rest! We have an extensive, creative training program with individualized support and many ways to grow your career.
This position requires you to be on-site in our office at least four days per week. The core hours for this position are primarily Monday through Friday 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. or 12:00 p.m. – 8:00 p.m
Starting salary in the $60,000 range based on relevant experience, industry knowledge, skills and expertise.
At USLI, our goal is to strengthen our community and culture by representing all races, genders, religions and sexual orientations. We continue to move conversations about diversity, equity and inclusion forward to ensure every community member has a sense of belonging, a voice and a seat at the table. USLI provides full-time community members with a comprehensive benefits package, access to wellness programs, continuing education resources, and multiple opportunities to get involved with charitable organizations.
Minimum Requirements:At least two years prior insurance experience (carrier or agency)
ORAt least three years prior business experience. Successful candidates have had prior business experience in the following industries:
Financial services, such as banking, mortgage underwriting, financial consulting, asset management, business analystLegal services, such as attorney, paralegalRelevant call center experience
Candidates with less experience may be eligible to apply for other opportunities with USLI, take a look at our other postings!

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Associate Underwriter
output_json.summary: USLI seeks candidates for an Instant Quote Associate Underwriter role.
job_responsibilities: offer insurance quotes over the phone
benefits: 100% of monthly medical premiums paid by USLI
output_json.company_information: USLI offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance with no payroll deduction, gym access, and quarterly bonuses.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: USLI aims to represent all races, genders, religions, and sexual orientations, promoting diversity, equity, and inclusion.
